topic: Sassy Orders Team 56: Track Open Innovation

children.summary: Manual and inefficient process of extracting useful information from recorded content, meetings, interviews, lectures, podcasts.
Platform transforms media into searchable, interactive content using OpenAI Whisper for transcription, Facebook Bird for summarization, and Pinode.audio for speaker identification.

Built on Next.js with TypeScript, ShatScene for frontend, Wavesurfer.js for visualization, Video.js for playback, Nerd.js and Express for backend processes, Media with FFM MPEG, Compromise.js for entity recognition, Sentiment.js for emotional content analysis.
Uses YouTube URL to generate transcripts, also recognizes speaker 1 and speaker 0.
Shows main page for uploading audio, recording, and waveform visualization; demonstrates transcription, mind map generation, and sentiment analysis features.
Generates transcript from uploaded audio or YouTube URL link.
Creates mind map from transcripts, with timestamped words and waveform visualization.
Mentor showed interest in collaborating to make project open source; discussed potential for full-fledged premium product with enough funding.
